Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor™ System for Rapid Detection of Group A Strep
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Group A Strep using chromatographic immunoassay with BD Veritor System Reader
Indications for Use Summary: A rapid chromatographic immunoassay for direct and qualitative detection of Group A Streptococcus antigen from throat swabs of symptomatic patients, intended for use with BD Veritor System Reader as an aid in diagnosis of Group A Strep; negative results should be confirmed by bacterial culture.
